contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1976 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). The Frogs of Aristophanes Belle Vue (Cumberland Suite), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:56 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 2:35 p.m. 1 Tredegar Town Band John Childs 2 Brodsworth Colliery Band Ken Johnson 3 Slaithwaite Band Peter Wadsworth 4 Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin Unknown Result Laganvale Band Harry Brittain Unknown Result Foresters Brass Edward Massey Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Les Hine Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band Harry Bentham Unknown Result Cinderford Band Cecil Chappell Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band Peter Bright Unknown Result Barrow Shipyard Band Barry Thompson Unknown Result Walkden Band Hugh Parry Unknown Result Thornsett Brian Taylor Unknown Result Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band Alan Lawton Unknown Result Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band Bernard Wilson Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock Unknown Result Knottingley Silver Band T. B. Pollard Unknown Result Coventry Imperial Ray Stuttard Withdrawn Hepworth Band George Kaye Withdrawn Linthwaite Silver Band Bob Lennon
